languages.text: "Слава Императору, что ваш рассудок прояснился. Отдайте приказ стражу — мы уже достаточно потеряли времени здесь".
"Thank the Emperor for ending this brief spell of madness. Give the order to the watcher. We have lost enough time here already."
languages.original_text: "Слава Императору, что ваш рассудок прояснился. Отдайте приказ стражу — мы уже достаточно потеряли времени здесь".

traits.locale_text: "Thank the Emperor for ending this brief spell of madness. Command the guard, we have lost enough time here already."
"Thank the Emperor for ending this brief spell of madness. Command the guard, we have lost enough time here already."
"Thank the Emperor for ending this brief spell of madness. Give the order to the guard. We have lost enough time here already."
"Thank the Emperor for ending this brief spell of madness. Give the order to the guard. We have lost enough time here already."
"Thank the Emperor for ending this brief spell of madness. Give the order to the watcher. We have lost enough time here already."
"Thank the Emperor for ending this brief spell of madness. Give the order to the watcher. We have lost enough time here already."

languages.text: "Dem Imperator sei Dank, dass er diesen kurzen Anflug von Wahnsinn beendet hat. Gebt dem Beobachter den Befehl. Wir haben hier schon genug Zeit verloren."
languages.original_text: "Thank the Emperor for ending this brief spell of madness. Give the order to the watcher. We have lost enough time here already."

traits.locale_text: "Dem Imperator sei Dank, dass er diesen kurzen Anflug von Wahnsinn beendet hat. Gebt dem Beobachter den Befehl. Wir haben hier schon genug Zeit verloren."

languages.text: « Loué soit l'Empereur pour avoir mis fin à cette folie passagère. Donnez l'ordre au gardien. Nous avons assez perdu de temps comme ça. »
languages.original_text: "Thank the Emperor for ending this brief spell of madness. Give the order to the watcher. We have lost enough time here already."

traits.locale_text: « Loué soit l'Empereur pour avoir mis fin à cette folie passagère. Donnez l'ordre au gardien. Nous avons assez perdu de temps comme ça. »

languages.text: “感谢帝皇结束了这场短暂的疯狂。对守望者下达命令吧，我们在这里浪费的时间已经够多了。”
languages.original_text: "Thank the Emperor for ending this brief spell of madness. Give the order to the watcher. We have lost enough time here already."

traits.locale_text: “感谢帝皇结束了这场短暂的疯狂。对守望者下达命令吧，我们在这里浪费的时间已经够多了。”

languages.text: «Doy gracias al Emperador por poner fin a esta locura transitoria. Dé la orden al vigilante. Ya hemos perdido aquí mucho tiempo».
languages.original_text: "Thank the Emperor for ending this brief spell of madness. Give the order to the watcher. We have lost enough time here already."

traits.locale_text: «Doy gracias al Emperador por poner fin a esta locura transitoria. Dé la orden al vigilante. Ya hemos perdido aquí mucho tiempo».

languages.text: 「この短い狂気の時期が終わったことを皇帝陛下に感謝しましょう。監視者に命令を出してください。ここで十分すぎるほど時間を無駄にしました」
languages.original_text: "Thank the Emperor for ending this brief spell of madness. Give the order to the watcher. We have lost enough time here already."

traits.locale_text: 「この短い狂気の時期が終わったことを皇帝陛下に感謝しましょう。監視者に命令を出してください。ここで十分すぎるほど時間を無駄にしました」

languages.text: "İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki bu kısa süreli çılgınlık geçti. Gözcüye emir verelim. Burada yeterince zaman kaybettik."
languages.original_text: "Thank the Emperor for ending this brief spell of madness. Give the order to the watcher. We have lost enough time here already."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki bu kısa süreli çılgınlık geçti. Gözcüye emir verelim. Burada yeterince zaman kaybettik."
